about_the_game:
Soul Of Savarog
It brings all the games of the "Soul Of Savarog" series, a mobile horror game series developed by Twisted Universe, to the computer and brings them together with real game lovers.

Story

savarog
"Savarog", the first game of the series, begins with a detective entering an underground shelter. Surprises await the detective who enters the underground shelter. Savarog will accompany our detective on his journey.
Savarog, which tells the story of the detective's journey in the underground shelter, aims to provide the atmosphere of fear and tension at the highest level.

Savarog 2
"Savarog 2", the second game in the series, begins with a detective realizing that something is wrong when he enters his house. Savarog will accompany the detective who enters the house throughout the rest of the game. "Savarog 2," which deals with the confusion experienced by the detective, aims to confuse you and take the fear experience to a different point.
The game invites players to an adventure in a universe full of deep mystery, full of complex puzzles and dangerous secrets. "Savarog 2" aims to offer players a fascinating and suspenseful experience with its dark and mysterious atmosphere.

rule
The third game of the horror game series, "Rule", begins with the detective waking up in a mysterious place. Various difficulties await the detective trying to understand things. These difficulties that the detective will experience will determine the fate of the players. As the game progresses, you will play games intertwined with ever-increasing tension and fear.
"Rule" invites players to an immersive adventure and aims to provide an unforgettable experience in its mysterious and dangerous world. The games within the game shape the players' decisions and actions, creating an atmosphere full of excitement and tension.

Savarog 3
"Savarog 3," the fourth game in the series, begins with a detective going to explore an underground shelter. There is something the detective who explores the shelter does not know: the tense events he will encounter. For the rest of the game, Savarog will accompany our detective. In this journey of discovery, players prepare to discover dangerous secrets and a dark past as they venture deeper into the mysterious lair.
Under the guidance of Savarog, an adventure full of tension-filled moments ensues as the detective faces the challenges he faces. "Savarog 3" aims to provide an unforgettable horror experience while inviting players into a dark and mysterious world.

Realism

As TWISTED UNIVERSE, we did our best to make the character hold objects in a very realistic and natural way.
Additionally, we used the game engine Unreal Engine 4.27.2 to make the game's lighting, textures, and shadows look their best.
We did our best to create as realistic environments as possible and provide a realistic sound experience.
In order to make the atmosphere of the game more realistic, HUD is not shown throughout the game.
Because we built zero HUD specifically into the game, interactions do not require any menu interaction.

Gameplay

The Soul Of Savarog series is played with a first-person character and we experience the whole story through the character's eyes.
The Soul Of Savarog series directs the player as little as possible in order to increase the sense of discovery.
In order to keep the player tense at every moment of the game, the game stimulates the player in various ways.

Language Support

Soul of Savarog supports 9 languages.
The game has 9 language support in order to reach as many people as possible and spread to wide geographies.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Soul of Savarog includes four of Twisted Universe's mobile horror thriller games. All of these plays tell the story of Savarog. Play Savarog, Savarog 2, Rule and Savarog 3 respectively.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
